subject: docs: add research items for commit model improvements
body:
New Research/Investigation section in TODO.md:

1. Device/Platform Attribution
   - Split contributions by committer name (mobile vs desktop)
   - Config mapping for name variations with device tags

2. AI-Powered Commit Categorization
   - Claude reads commit messages + diffs to understand intent
   - Auto-tagging beyond conventional commit types
   - Confidence scores and human override

3. Multi-Tag Commit Model
   - One commit can have multiple tags (feat + refactor + docs)
   - Schema change from single type to tags[] with weights
   - Backward compatibility with existing data

4. Tag-Centric Reporting
   - Shift focus from commit counts to accomplishments
   - Effort weighting based on complexity
   - Activity vs output distinction
